Docs.value: The URI of the resource, or null of the resource is anonymous or a literal.

Docs.summary: The KnowledgeModel that created this resource.
Docs.value: The KnowledgeModel that created this resource, or null if this resource is not associated with a KnowledgeModel.
Docs.remarks: This is the source of the graph that the properties use.

Docs.summary: Follows an arc in the RDF graph.
Docs.value: All resources that are objects of statements for which this resource is the subject and is the predicate.
Docs.remarks: The model searched is the same one returned by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public SemWeb.Resource[] Item[SemWeb.Entity relation, bool forward] { get; };

Docs.param: to follow the relation forward, to follow the relation in reverse.
Docs.summary: Follows an arc in the RDF graph forward or backward.
Docs.value: If is , this property results all resources that are objects of statements for which this resource is the subject and is the predicate. Otherwise, this property results all resources that are subjects of statements for which this resource is the object and is the predicate.
Docs.remarks: The model searched is the same one returned by the property.

Docs.summary: The base class for all resources that statements can express relations between.
Docs.remarks: This class cannot be inherited. You can only inherit from the class.
